fundName: EcoFunds ESG Aware MSCI USA Small-Cap ETF
fundDescription: The EcoFunds ESG Aware MSCI USA Small-Cap ETF is an exchange-traded fund that aims to provide investment results that, before fees and expenses, correspond generally to the total return performance of the MSCI USA Small Cap Extended ESG Focus Net Return Index.
